typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as string,
		Average_Mon_Rate as string,
		Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertStringToStagingDataType select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate = EOM_Rate_Converted,
		Average_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate_Converted
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
GetFirtRowFromAnalyticsFunction derive(Date = toTimestamp(Date, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		EOM_Rate_Converted = toDecimal(EOM_Rate, 18, 7),
		Average_Mon_Rate_Converted = toDecimal(Average_Mon_Rate,18,7)) ~> ConvertStringToStagingDataType
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over(Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency),
	asc(Date, false),
	asc(Base_Currency, false),
	asc(Target_Currency, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticFunctionGroupForexDateBaseAndTargetCurrency
AnalyticFunctionGroupForexDateBaseAndTargetCurrency filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirtRowFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,7)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Forex_Date = Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate
	)) ~> StagingDB
